children.value: Softball.app is a Progressive web app for optimizing softball/baseball/kickball lineups via Monte Carlo simulations.
Watch the video to find out more or just try it out here
. Getting started is free (heck, everything is free at this point) and doesnâ€™t require an account.

Current Features:
Batting lineup optimization using an open source set of optimization algorithms (

)
YouTube video walkup songs
Cloud backup and cross-device sync (requires an account)
Data export as a json file
Works offline

frontmatter.title: I'm Sick of Coach Batting Me Last
frontmatter.subtitle: Automated Softball Lineup Optimizer Using Historical Hitting Data
